summary: Battle of hogwarts moments that don’t make me want to fling myself into the void: Trelawney using “a move like a tennis serve”...
body:
Battle of hogwarts moments that don’t make me want to fling myself into the void:

  • Trelawney using “a move like a tennis serve” to fling crystal balls at death eaters
  • Ron punching Draco from underneath the invisibility cloak
  • McGonagall sprinting by with a herd of galloping desks yelling “CHARGE!”
  • Neville lobbing mandrakes, aka screaming hell babies, at death eaters while wearing earmuffs (hopefully the fluffy pink ones)
  • How uncomfortable the romoine kiss made Harry
  • Kreacher leading the house elves into battle, fighting in the names of Harry and Regulus
  • Not my daughter, you bitch!
  • Neville pulling the Sword of Gryffindor from the Sorting Hat
  • “Without Ron and Hermione to help him he [Harry] couldn’t seem to marshal his ideas”
  • Ron punching Draco from underneath the invisibility cloak
  • Snape dying
  • Ron breaking Voldemort’s silencing charm

slytherin: wants the world to suffer for being so inferior

blog.name: covalentcrisis
blog.description:
literature! drama! woodwork!

your local underage bisexual

body:
harry potter x makeup

ok but what if one day harry gets super sick of his scar and tries lots of spells to remove it but he can’t so he’s just moping about in the common room and one of the gyrffindor girls is like “….have you tried concealer??”

and thus all the girls who put on makeup regularly gather around to teach harry how to pick a shade right for his skin and how to get the best coverage etc and from then on whenever harry gets sick of being recognised / doesn’t want to look at this scar he just covers it up

but WAIT. harry doesn’t stop at concealer. he gets REALLY into makeup and starts experimenting with it more: eyeshadow, eyeliner, lip gloss, the works.

and he just starts walking around hogwarts looking amazing and Witches Weekly start writing articles on his looks like ‘The Chosen One’s Chosen Look!’

(pretty stupid considering I have 0 context of makeup back then or of makeup now but…a concept)

summary: Strange that I used to consider the Chamber of Secrets the weakest entry in the Harry Potter series - watching it now it's just...
body:
Strange that I used to consider the Chamber of Secrets the weakest entry in the Harry Potter series - watching it now it’s just as good as the Philosopher’s Stone for me - with the first hints of the darker aspect of the later films especially in the third act.

William Ross’s score arrangement of John Williams’s themes is remarkably convincing, even if the occasional cue is lifted nearly straight from the previous movie’s soundtrack. Fawkes Theme is one of the best of William’s tenure as the Potter composer.

reblog.comment:

blog.name: written-in-the-unlit-stars
blog.title: all those starless nights
blog.description:
How lost would you be, without the stars to guide you home?
Fledgling Writer | Novice Artist
libra | aus. | she/her | intj-a | dcmk, ac

A fledgling writer with a dream of writing her own book some day, and is both an avid shipper and a political activist.

CURRENTLY:
Drawing sidebar picture
Listening to RAIN MAN by AKIHIDE
Reading Shokugeki no Souma
Watching Naruto Shippuden
Writing nothing, absolutely nothing

I'm basically incapable of writing fluff and romance, so don't expect any of that—either entirely, or well-written—but you can expect lots of angst and pain and internal conflict, because I can write that. Definitely.

Looking up at the endless night, I wandered and wondered, eyes wide and full of a sky of unlit stars—"How much longer?"

"How much longer before it's all over?"

tags: just jay being honset about his friend
summary: What does Jay think of Nya?
question: What does Jay think of Nya?
answer: Jay: She is really cool I mean have you seen that girl in quidditch she is awsome! I guess Kai hyped up her skills to the Gryffindor team as soon as he got in because she was accapeted as a first year player like how cool is that even Lloyd’s got to train a year before he is up against the best seeker out there… Me! Also she can ace like any class, if it wasn’t for her being such a bold, stubborn and reckless Gryff I’d say she could of been a great Raven.

reblog.comment: Jay: She is really cool I mean have you seen that girl in quidditch she is awsome! I guess Kai hyped up her skills to the Gryffindor team as soon as he got in because she was accapeted as a first year player like how cool is that even Lloyd’s got to train a year before he is up against the best seeker out there… Me! Also she can ace like any class, if it wasn’t for her being such a bold, stubborn and reckless Gryff I’d say she could of been a great Raven.
